ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 90
ygData.msgSnippet: Anything is fair game I suppose... One thing is for certain, there must be some kind of line, or cord or something that connects the firewater to the metal
ygData.messageBody:
Anything is fair game I suppose...

One thing is for certain, there must be some kind of line, or cord or
something that connects the firewater to the metal rods. I mean, there
just has to be something to conduct the heat to the rods...

Rotgut
